Package Game.ClientServer.Server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.ClientServer.Server.Server
  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the backend logic for the Battleship server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Server()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clientDisconnected()
      Notifies the server that a client has disconnected, so it can update accordingly
      void closeConnections()
      Closes the server socket and sends the END CONNECTION protocol to all clients, empties the list of clients
      java.lang.String getRandomConfiguration()
      Returns a randomly selected configuration from the stored configurations

      Creates a new socket on a given port and waits for connection requests.

      Entry point for the server.

      Stores the provided board and boat configuration in the server

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Entry point for the server. Initializes the server and it's UI
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments, not used

      • listenForConnections

        public void listenForConnections​(int portNumber)
        Creates a new socket on a given port and waits for connection requests. Requests are handled in separate threads
        Parameters:
        portNumber - Port number that the socket is to be opened on

      • clientDisconnected

        public void clientDisconnected()
        Notifies the server that a client has disconnected, so it can update accordingly

      • getRandomConfiguration

        public java.lang.String getRandomConfiguration()
        Returns a randomly selected configuration from the stored configurations
        Returns:
        String containing board dimension and ship locations

      • storeConfiguration

        public void storeConfiguration​(java.lang.String boatConfig)
        Stores the provided board and boat configuration in the server
        Parameters:
        boatConfig - String containing information about the board's dimension and location and size of boats

      • closeConnections

        public void closeConnections()
        Closes the server socket and sends the END CONNECTION protocol to all clients, empties the list of clients

      • setFinalized

        public void setFinalized​(boolean isFinalized)
        Sets the server to a finalized state. That is, if it is in a finalized state then when the last client disconnects, the server will shut down.
        Parameters:
        isFinalized - True if the server is to be finalized, false otherwise
